ques: Could you please provide a ________ on this matter?

________ education is part of the curriculum.

We can't predict the ________ of the negotiations.

People ________ differently to stressful situations.

The rules and regulations can ________ our actions.
Her story didn't ________ with the facts.

It's important to ________ calmly in emergencies.

Feel free to leave a ________ below the article.
We shouldn't let fear ________ our creativity.

I will ________ with you via email.

They tried to ________ his freedom.
